Lyric:
[00:23.070]Just let me tell you now
[00:29.470]When I had you to myself I didn't want you around
[00:34.580]Those pretty faces always made you stand out in a crowd
[00:39.170]But someone picked you from the bunch
[00:41.860]One glance was all it took
[00:44.140]Now it's much too late for me to take a second look
[00:49.580]Oh baby give me one more chance
[00:52.720](To show you that I love you)
[00:54.720]Won't you please let me back in your heart
[00:58.750]Oh darlin' I was blind to let you go
[01:03.160](Let you go, baby)
[01:04.270]But now since I see you in his arms
[01:08.560](I want you back) Yes I do now
[01:10.550](I want you back) Ooh ooh baby
[01:12.620](I want you back) Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
[01:15.170](I want you back) Nah, nah, nah, nah
[01:17.820]Tryin' to live without your love is one long, sleepless night
[01:22.300]Let me show you, girl, that I know wrong from right
[01:27.070]Every street you walk on, I leave tear stains on the ground
[01:31.950]Following the girl I didn't even want around
[01:36.590]Just let me tell you now
[01:37.070]Oh baby, all I need is one more chance
[01:40.020](To show you that I love you)
[01:41.960]Won't you please let me back in your heart
[01:46.150]Oh darlin' I was blind to let you go
[01:50.210](Let you go, baby)
[01:51.580]But now since I see you in his arms
[02:05.500]All I want, all I need, all I want, all I need
[02:15.300]Just one more chance
[02:17.560]Show you that I love you, baby
[02:22.580]Forget what happened then
[02:25.710]Let me live again
[02:27.550]Oh baby, I was blind to let you go
[02:31.590]But now since I see you in his arms
[02:36.520]Spare me of this cost
[02:39.040]Give back what I lost
[02:41.510]Oh baby I need one more chance
[02:44.080]I tell you that I love you
[02:46.190]I want you back!
